name: Ivan Poe Demo
description:
[COSMIC SOUP – HOLD MUSIC – RECORDED MESSAGE STARTS]

Down the Colons!
Stamp the Pits!
Farm the Hemispheres!
Sound the Tannoy!
Collect the Solids!
Of the Shelf!
[RECORDING CLICKS OFF]

Ivan Poe needs your help to explore this mysterious world. Locked inside a celestial loop, you need to take control of rollin’ Poe, pick your way across cosmic planes covered with bubbling, colourful patterns, and traverse the different realms therein.

Trapped within a spinning room: watch out for Dummy Ivans, dodge the spinners and then pick a door, any door? Falling through the Cosmic Colon you spill out into one of numerous rooms found at the other end of these tubes. Here you’ll meet curious characters, who’ll guide you on your way and reveal just a little bit more about the Gold Ones.

Fulfil your quota in the Squelch Pit Factory, find-your-way across the gantries and conveyors, watch out for the chitlers, rams’n’hoppers, and don’t fall down the tubs’n’funnels! Harvest the hemispheres, avoid the maggots, play the tannoy and master the ramps to collect all the Elephant Solids.

Switcheroo, you’re falling into another world. Who’s in control here?

Key Features
  • Roll and jump to explore anywhere you like.
  • Choose doorways and see where they goes.
  • Each level is a cryptic puzzle for Ivan to solve.
  • Encounter other Gold Ones who give you a helping hand.
  • Free to play.
